author: jingyuluo
body: This PR is to replace #19372 for Offline DQM of Displaced Jet Paths of EXO group(JIRA ticket: https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-1259).  It depends on the #19293 and #19178 for utilizing JetMonitor and HTMonitor
title: (Replacement of #19372) Add DisplacedJet Paths Offline DQM
